title.rendered: Employees of Avery Dennison participate in the Mega Health Camp organized by Smile Foundation in Gurugram

content.rendered: Employees of Avery Dennison actively participated in the Mega Health Camp organized by Smile Foundation in the Dundahera village, Gurugram, to create awareness on reproductive health. Avery Dennison employees were part of activities like registration, crowd mobilization, support at pharmacy counter and counselling desk, documentation and photography. The Health Camp provided free medical consultation and medicines to the beneﬁciaries. Smile Foundation has partnered with Avery Dennison to empower underprivileged women in Sarhaul and Dundahera villages of Gurugram with an aim to work towards reproductive health education, entrepreneurial skills and spreading awareness on various government schemes.
